item.title: Sherlock Bumblebee writeup
item.description:
HTB SHERLOCKS - BUMBLEBEE

Description

An external contractor has accessed the internal forum here at Forela via the Guest WiFi and they appear to have stolen credentials for the administrative user! We have attached some logs from the forum and a full database dump in sqlite3 format to help you in your investigation.

Files Attached

Solution

We shall use a DB Browser for SQLite to make analysis easier. This can be downloaded from https://sqlitebrowser.org/.

item.title: üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è About Me
item.description:
Greetings, intrepid wanderers!
I am Lord Sudo, a red teamer and CTF player for p3rf3ctr00t.

Join me on a journey through the enigmatic landscapes of digital intrigue. Within these virtual corridors, secrets await discovery, and the art of exploration becomes the key to unlocking hidden knowledge.

Dare to delve into the heart of my mysterious works, where the boundaries between reality and the digital realm blur. Uncover the cryptic narratives that weave through the tapestry of cybernetic adventures.
